attributes.action: Reconsider the scraping of the 10% tax band for those people who had to retire early because of ill health and are on a reduced private pension and incapacity benefit.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Perhaps the Government might consider a higher tax code for those individuals who had to retire early through ill health and are on a modest private pension and incapacity benefit.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
